original_title: Laundry to Landscape Grey Water Systems
overview: Instructional video about how to design and build Laundry to Landscape  Greywater Systems. These are the simplest, most economical greywater systems to install yourself as an owner or renter, and a good green collar job opportunity (as a self-employed installer or as part of your landscape, plumbing, or construction business).
title: Laundry to Landscape Grey Water Systems
